entry.title: Sunday night: Drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Drizzle or rain showers changing to snow overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm north of Terrenceville. Wind southwest 20 km/h except northeast 20 gusting to 40 north of Marystown late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 9:09 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:09 PM NST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along the coast. POP 40%
